column2: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
column3: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Vokurudzira VaTrump Kusaita Zvemangoromera
column3: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pasi rose nemusi weChina nekushora kwavakaita mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vachiti vanofanira kukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kwete kuda kuita zvemangoromera. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York muAmerica kumusangano mukuru wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA. Mutungamiri wenyika haana kutaura nezvenyaya dzezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nyaya inova yange yave rwiyo rwavo kumusangano uyu. VaMugabe vakati hapana chakaipa kuti VaTrump vazviridzire hwamanda asi vakati inofanira kunge ichitaura nezverunyararo pasi rose. VaTrump vakasiya vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rose vasina neremuromo mushure mekunge vayambira North Korea kuti vaigona kuiparadza ikaramba ichipinda nemwenje mudziva ichisvokosva America neshamwari dzayo nekupota ichivhundutsira nekukanda zvombo zvemuchadenga. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatsoropodzawo Iran, Venezuela nedzimwe nyika dzavakati hadziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vakasetsa vamwe vatungamiri mudare iri apo vakafananidza VaTrump naGoriyati wemubhaibheri anongoziva kushandisa chisimba. Vakatyorazve vanhu mbabvu apo vakati VaTrump vanofanira kuridza havo hwamanda yavo asi vachiita izvi mukuunza runyararo munyika dzepasi rose. VaMugabe vakashorawo America nekubuda muchibvumirano chakanangana nekuchengetedza mamiriro ekunze cheParis Climate Agreement. Asi VaMugabe vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzongorega nyika dzakabudirira idzi dzichityora zvisungo zvechibvumirano ichi. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe ine hukama hwakanaka nesangano reUnited Nations asi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti bazi rakakosha reUnited Nations Security Council rivandudzwe. Dare reSecurity Council rine nyika shanu chete dzisingabude mudare iri uye dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dzinoti Russia, America, China, France neBritain, uye nyika gumi dzisina masimba dzinoita majanho kugara mudare iri kwemakore maviri. Panyika gumi idzi pane nyika nhatu chete dzemuAfrica dzinoti Ethiopia, Senegal neEgypt. Asi Africa nedzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti nyika dziri mudare iri dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dziwedzerwe kubva pashanu dziripo. Sachigaro weMDC-T muAmerica, VaDen Moyo, vashora zvikuru VaMugabe vachiti vanoda kupindira nyaya dzisinei neZimbabwe uye vanoshora vatungamiri vavanoti vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu asi ivo kunyika kwavo vasingaremekedze vanovapikisa uye vachitonga nedemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naMuzvare Tsitsi Chiriseri, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chakaratidzira muNew Yorl chichishora matongero aVaMugabe. Muzvare Chiriseri vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti dai VaMugabe vaiita zvavanotaura, dai Zimbabwe isiri mukanwa mamupere. Asi mumwe muzvinafundo paMalone University kuOhio muAmerica, VaMoses Rumano, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe ekutsiura VaTrump. Kunyange hazvo zvakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe vakange vachinetsekana nekufamba pavakange vachienda kunotura mashoko avo kudare reGeneral Assembly, vakawanda vanoti vange vachiratidza kuti hutano hwavo huri nani. Musangano weUNGA uyu ndewechimakumi manomwe nembiri.

column2: Amnesty International Yosimbaradza Kodzero dzeVavhoti Musarudzo
column3: Sangano reAmnesty International raparura gwaro rezvekodzero dzevanhu rarinoda kuti ritevedzwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena pamwe nekuti munyika muve netsika yekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano chikuru muAmnesty International kudunhu reSouthern Africa, VaLlyod Kuvheya, vanoti zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisira kunyangaritswa kwevanhu, kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhukadzi nevanasikana nezvimwe, zvikaitwa nyika inoita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwewo zvinodiwa neAmnesty International kuti mapato, hurumende nevari kukwikwidza vaiite kuti mapurisa nemauto vamirire kushungurudza vanhu, kumira kubvisa vanhu nechisimba kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara, kupa vanhu mukana wekutaura zvavanoda pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevatori venhau. Vatiwo nyika inofanirwa kutevedza zviga zvese zvekucherechedza kodzero dzevanhu zvakaita seAfrican Charter on Human and People’s Rights. Munyori muZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Makanatsa Makonese, vati gwaro raparurwa nhasi rakakosha chose sezvo pasina chinofamba munyika kana pasingaremekedzwi kodzeo dzevanhu. Vati zvakakosha kuti vese vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vaise kodzero dzevanhu pamberi apo vanenge vachitsvaga rutsigiro kubva kubva kuvanhu. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzakachena kuti nyika ifambire mberi. Vakuvheya vati gwaro iri richapihwa kumapato ese ari kupinda musarudzo, mapurisa, masoja nevese vane chekuita nesarudzo sezvo vachida kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakasiyana nesarudzo dzakadarika idzo dzaiita mutauro nekuda kwekupondwa, kurohwa nekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo kupera kwemwedzi uno uye vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti mamirira akaita zvinhu pari zvino zvinoratidza sekuti sarudzo idzi dzichange dziri nani panyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

column2: Vana Chiremba Vanopinda Muzuva Repiri Vachiramwa Mabasa
column3: Vana chiremba vapinda neChina muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba avo vanoti pamusangano wavaita nebazi rezveutano, hurumende yavimbisa kutambira chinyunyuto chimwe chete chete. Vachitaura neStudio7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Edgar Munatsi, vati nhengo dzavo zhinji hadzisi pabasa sezvo vakamirira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. VaMunatsivati vanotorwadziwa zvikuru sanachiremba kuti hupenyu hwevanhu huri parumananzombe nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavo uku. Vakurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMunatsi vatinhengo dzavo dziri kutyityidzirwa nevamwe vakuru vemuzvipatara asi vati mumusangano wavaita nehurumende nhasi, vavimbiswa kuti kuita kwakadai kuchamiswa. Vana chiremba vanoti pahurukuro dzavaita nhasi nehurumende, hurumende yavimbisa kugadzirisa chinyunyuto chimwechete chekuvawanisa mabasa kana vapedza zvidzodzo zvavo zvepamusoro. Pari zvino hurumende yange ichibatirira kuzvitupa zvana chiremba ava kwegore kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isingavapi mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, VaInnocent Zano, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvavo zvese, vonyorerana pasi kuti vadzokere kubasa. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa, vana chiremba vange vakatogara zvavo vachitaura nyaya nguva dzebasa. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura nevarwere sezvo kwange kuchidiwa tsamba kubva kubazi rezveutano . Asi VaBrian Paradza, avo vashanyira hama yavo kuParirenyatwa vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudzo iri vakati murwere wavo kubva nezuro haasati awonekwa nachiremba. Bazi rezvautano rabudisa gwaro rekukurudzira vana chiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa apo zvichemo zvavo zvinenge zvichigadziriswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yaburitsa mashoko ichiti haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kuvhiringa hutano hwenyika yese nekutadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. No media source currently available

column2: SADC Inoti Yakwanisa Kudzikamisa Zvinhu kuMozambique muHondo neVanopfurikidza Mwero
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakabatana nevatungamiri venyika dziri muSADC Troika uye dzakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vaive sachigaro pamusangano waiirirwa padandemutande uyu. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau SADC yakati ichibatsirwa nemauto eRwanda yakwanisa kudzikamisa zvinhu mudunhu iri kunyangwe paine kurwisana pano neapo asi ikati yave kubatsira kuunza budiriro mudunhu iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paAfrica University kwaMutare Doctor Iris Shiripinda vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamwe vatungamiri venyika yemuSADC haisi kunyatsozvipira kupedza hondo yemuMozambique sezvo vachitia sekunge vanoona chouviri pazviri. No media source currently available

column2: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzowana Raramo neKugadzira Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
column3: Panguva apo vakawanda vari kusiya mabasa vamwe vachienda kumamisha nekuda kwekuvhingidzwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19, dzimwe mhuri dziri kuwana raramo yakanaka nekugadzira mamasiki ayo dzinotengesa. Mumwe mugari wekuSunningdale muHarare, Baba Edson Masoramuvari kugadzira pamwe chete nemudzimai wavo mamasiki avari kutengesera kumakambani pamwe neveruzhinji. Baba Musora, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti kosi yavakaita yekusona yakavavhurira mukana pakatanga kuvharirwa vanhu mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Lockdown yauya hatina kusvika pakuitwa lockdown nepfungwa zvese. Takatanga kugadzira ma washable masks taona kuti acho ari kugadzira ari kutengeswa achingoraswa mubhini. VaMasora, avo vane vana vanomwe vanoti bhizimusi ravo riri kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemamasiki avo anomhanyirwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwemagadziro akanaka avanoaita pamwe nemutengo wakachipa. Takawana contract yema 100 masks ku Joiner City. Nzira dzekuti zvinhu zvedu zvimhanye ndezvekutsvaga ma orders kubva kuma kambani. Ndizvo zvinoita kuti zvinhu zvedu zvifambe. Mudzimai wavo, Amai Jennifer Masora, vanoti dambudziko ravari kuona nderekuti mamasiki ane ngozi pahutano hwevanhu vane huchapa uye vachifarira akagadzirwa nemicheka ine mavara matema. Ma mask akanaka anotidzivirira COVID asi dambudziko randiri kuona pane vakawanda nderekuti havasati vakuita hutsanana. Unonyatsotarisa oona kuti mask iyi yaane mazuva haizivi kuwachwa. Ndiro dambudziko randiri kuona. Amai Masora vanoti kushingairira pane zvavari kuita kwayambutsa vakawanda. Iye zvino murairidzi chaiye ndinotomukunda kuita mari, kunyanya iyo nguva ino yakaoma kudai. Vese vari mumahofisi ndinovakunda kurarama. Handiende mu queue ku bhanga kunotora mari. Munhu anouya nejira rake ndomusonera, oenda ku bank ouya ondipa mari. Mumwe mudzimai ari kurarama nekutengesa mamaisiki, Amai Naomi Chinhaire, vanoti zvekuzarirwa mumba ne lockdown zvakavapa mazano avakanga vasingambofungiri. Ndinoshandisa ma tailors ekumakambani mahombe vanondipa pfungwa dzekugadzira zvinhu zvakakodzera zvekuti kana uri kunze uku zvinhu zvako zvinotengwa zvakanaka. Ndinoshandisa pattern nyowani yekuti munhu anotenga asingagunun’une. Amai Chinhaire vanoti mhuri yavo yatove neraramo inodarika yavaive nayo kutanga kwegore rino. Handidi kunyepa, zvinhu zvangu zviri kufamba. Dzimwe nguva ndinobuda mumba kuma seven kuseni ndoenda pandinongomira. Panguva diki diki zvinhu zvangu zvinenge zvapera. Pamwe ndinobuda ndine ma masks anosvika 50 asi ndinodzoka ese apera. VaTitus Doyce vanofarira zvigadzirwa zvemamasiki Amai Chinhaire. Ma mask aya tinoada nekuti unonyatsofema zvakanaka, uye kana uri pane vanhu vanenge vachingokubvunza kuti wakaiwana kupi. Kana wakaburitsa mari unofanira kugutsikana nechinhu chaunenge watenga. Pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe munhu wese anofanira kufamba akapfeka masiki kumeso kwake kana ari pane veruzhinji, senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Sangano rehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti mamasiki chinhu chinofanira kugara chakashambidzika uye haifaniri kuchinjanwa. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Coach wemaWarriors mutsva munaNdira’
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti richatanga kutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors munaNdira apo pachange papera kondirakiti yaJoey “Mafero” Antipas uyo akafanobata chigaro chekurairidza chikwata ichi.   Kondirakiti yaAntipas  — uyo anorairidza Chicken Inn zvakare — ichapera nemusi wa31 Zvita.   Antipas akagadzwa kuti afanobata chigaro chekurairidza maWarriors zvichitevera kusiya basa kwakaitwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa apo maWarriors aive achangobva kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare competitions manager — anoti Antipas ndiye ari kurairidza chikwata ichi kusvika gore rino rapera uye vachazozivisa kuti ndiani achatora chigaro ichi.   “Parizvino Joey Antipas ndiye ari panyanga uye kondirakiti yake yatinayo ichapera musi wa31 Zvita gore rino, kubva ipapo ndipo tichazozivisa nyika kuti tave kufamba sei,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti parizvino Zifa yambokurukura nevarairidzi vangani kana kuti vangani vakauya kwavari vachitsvaga basa rekurairidza maWarriors,  Gwesela anoti, “Sekutaura kwandaita, tichakuzivisai kana musi wa31 Zvita wadarika apo kondirakiti yedu naAntipas inenge yapera.”   Mwedzi unotevera maWarriors achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon uye Antipas ndiye ari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata ichi.

column2: Sangano reARTUZ Ronyunyuta Kuti Nhengo Dzaro Dziri Kuramwa Mabasa Dzave Kutyisidzirwa
column3: Kuramwa mabasa kwenhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, kwapinda muzuva rechina nhasi, sangano iri richiti dzimwe nhengo dzaro dzinosanganisira munyori mukuru, VaRobson Chere, dzave kutyisidzirwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori pamwe nenhengo dzebato reZanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF kanawo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti kune vakaita musangano ku Acturus mudunhu reMashonaland East kunove kunodzidzisa VaChere, vachida kuti mudzidzisi uyu abviswe pachikoro ichi. VaMasaraure vanotiwo hakusi kuActurs chete kwavari kusangana nekutyisidzirwa kwenhengo dzavo, sezvo varairidzi vari kusangano nedambudziko iri mune mamwe matunhu. Asi vanoti huwandu hwevarairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa huri kuramba huchiwedzera zuva nezuva vachiti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti varairidzi vangangoda kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana ndivo chete vaenda kumabasa mune zvimwe zvikoro. Varairidzi vanoti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018, uye kuti vanyorerane zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuti vabhadharwe kunyoresa vana bvunzo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, kuti tinzwe kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kwakanganisa zvakadii dzidzo muzvikoro? No media source currently available

column2: Sarudzo Dzinotarisirwa Kuitwa Muna Chikumi Kana Chikunguru
column3: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti sarudzo dzichaitwa pakati pa31 Chikumi na 31 Chikunguru. Asi vanoti zuva chairo pamutemo richaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. ZEC inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu ndivo vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rindai Chipfunde Vava vanoti zviri kutaurwa naAmai Chigumba ndizvo zviri mumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, iro rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu nekusimudzira runyararo, rinoti pamazuva ari pakati pa10 Gumiguri 2017 na8 Kukadzi 2018, sangano ravo rakawana kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunoita zviuru zvishanu nemazana manomwe nemanomwe munguva yekunyoresa kwevanhu kuti vagovhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, Muzvare Sithabile Dewa, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo hazvina kunyatsomira zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kuzvigadzirisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Zimbabwe ine mukana wekuenda kuWC’
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu – Carlos ‘Murehwa’ Max – anoti anoshuvira kuona maWarriors achimbotambawo kumutambo weFIFA World Cup uye hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata ichi kuenda kumakwishu aya sezvo chizere nevatambi vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kunyika dzinosanganisira dziri kuEurope.   Apo mutambo World Cup uri kuenderera mberi kuQatar, Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu dzinoti Senegal, Ghana, Tunisia, Morocco neCameroon.   Murehwa, uyo akambotambira maWarriors, anoti hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata chenyika ichi kuenda kuWorld Cup asi hunge kana zvinhu zvose zvakarongeka.   “Iye zvino senyika takakomborerwa kuti tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope muzvikwata zvikuru saka kana tikarongeka tinoenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chiremerera chikuru kuona nyika yedu ichitamba kuWorld Cup, todawo kuiona iriko saka zvinoda mushandirapamwe kuti zvigokwanisika kuitika.   “Asi chekutanga ndechekuti ngatirwise zvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF zvibviswe tibve tatotanga gadziriro dzemutambo unotevera wa2026. Gadziriro dzinotanga izvezvi,” anodaro Murehwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yeZimbabwe, maWarriors haasati ambobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup kunyangwe zvazvo akapotsa nepadiki panguva yaairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch apo akatadziswa nemutambo mumwe chete paakazokundwa neCameroon.   Pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar, ndipo panobva patotanga gadziriro dzemutambo we2026 FIFA World Cup iyo icharongwa nenyika nhatu dzinoti United States of America, Mexico neCanada.    Carlos Max apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors   Zvakadaro, Murehwa – uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvenhabvu zvinosanganisira CAPS United, Dynamos neArcadia United – vazhinji havazive kuti zita rake remadunhurirwa iri rakatangira kupi.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa nevatsigiri vechikwata cheCAPS United panguva iyo aitambira Green Machine.   Anoti iye nevamwe vemuchikwata chake vaitamba nhabvu zvainwisa mvura zvakaona vachipihwa mazita emadunhurirwa nevatsigiri senzira yekuvarumbidza.   “Ndichiri kuCAPS United, kana waitamba nhabvu zvinonwisa mvura, vatsigiri vaikupa zita remadunhurirwa. Ini ndakazoona ndakushevedzwa kunzi Murehwa, ndikangozvigamuchira.   “Taive nevamwe vatambi vakaita saJoel Shacky Tauro akasvika pakushevedzwa kunzi Mr Goals nekuti ainwisa zvaidakadza, vamwe vakaita saNever Chiku ainzi Maswera sei kuchiti Joel Shambo ainzi Headmaster,” anodaro Murehwa.

column2: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
column3: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

column2: VaMudzvova Vofunga Kunotariswa Kunze kweNyika Mushure Mekubayiwa Jekiseni neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vasori
column3: Nhengo yesangano reTajamuka yakaitwa kafiramberi muHarare VaSilvanos Mudzvova vanoti vave kutarisira kuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika sezvo zvisiri kuzivikanwa kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni rainge riinei. Vanoti vesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights vakavakurudzira kuti vanotariswa navanamazvikokota vekunze sezvo pasina ari kuziva kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni reyi. Vati nyaya iyi iri kuvadya moyo nekuti havazive kuti hutano hwavo huchange hwakamira sei. VaMudzvova vakapambwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera kumba kwavo nevanhu vatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakatochwa pedyo neNharira Hills kuNorton. Vanhu vakapamba VaMudzvova vainge vakapakatira pfuti. Pari zvino VaMudzvova avo vari kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic muHarare vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo asi vachitiwo vakavhiyiwa neMuvhuro kugadzirisa matumbu avo ainge asina kumira zvakanaka kubva zvavakarohwa. No media source currently available

column2: VaChamisa Vanoshanyira Zvipatara Vachiona Varwere
column3: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana nanachiremba nevana mukoti munyika kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira chipatara chehurumende cheHarare Central uko vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachigunun’una nemari dzemihoro, VaChamisa varatidza kushushikana zvikuru nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Mumwe murwere anga ari muchipatara, VaFungai Mahachi, vati havasi kunyatsorapwa zvakakwana sezvo vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa. VaChamisa varumbidza vana chiremba nevakoti vashoma vanga vari pabasa nhasi vachibatsira vanhu vakazvitakura pamwe nevanga vachisununguka vachiti tsiye nyoro dzavari kuita dzekubatsira vanhu ava panguva iyo vari kuramwa mabasa chinhu chinokudzwa zvikuru. VaChamisa vati kana bato ravo richinge rapinda mumasimba vachaedza kugadzirisa matambudziko ose ari kusangana nenyika zvikuru sei munyaya dzehutano. Zvichakadai, sangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association raburitsa mashoko ekuti nhengo dzaro dzicharamba dzakakanda mapadza pasi kudzamara nhuna dzavo dzanzwikwa nehurumende. Sangano iri rinoti vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru havasi pamabasa sezvo vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi regurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirentatwa. Vana chiremba vava nemasvondo anodarika maviri vachiramwa basa sezvo vasiri kuwirirana nehurumende panyaya dzemihoro. No media source currently available

column2: Kasikana (8) shasha yemotor-cross
column3: KASIKANA kemakore masere okuberekwa koita zvinorova mumutambo wemotor-cross izvo zviri kukaona kachitatsurana nevakomana vakuru kwakari mumujaho yakasiyana.   Kare mujaho wemotor-cross waizivikanwa uri wevarume asi kuzouya kwakaita Tanya Muzinda, uyo akwanisa kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakasiyana dzekunze achihwina mikombe yakawanda, kwabva kwavhurira mikana vamwe vasikana vakaita saMufaro Kabasa (8) uyo ave kutevera mumatsimba ake.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Mufaro anoti chishuwo chake kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe sezvinoitwa naTanya kuburikidza nekuhwina mibairo yakawanda kunze kwenyika.   “Ndakazviona kuti hapana mutambo unonzi ndewevakomana chete, isu vasikana tinogona kuzviitawo uye pasina chinotikanganisa.   “Ndakazvarwa ndichingofarira kuchovha bhasikoro uye ndichikwikwidza nevakomana kumaraini. Pandakanzwa nezvaTanya ndipo ndakati ndinokwanisa kuzviitawo uye ndokutanga kukwikwidza kuDonnybrook.   “Hapana chinombonditadzisa kusvika kure nekuti zvese zviripo zvinondibatsira kuti ndibudirire,” anodaro Mufaro. Shasha iyi parizvino iri kuita Grade 4 pachikoro cheGroombridge Primary, muHarare uye anoti dzidzo ndiwo musimboti wezvose muhupenyu hwake nekudaro anoikoshesa sezvaanoita mutambo wemotor-cross.   Anoti paanoenda kuchikoro, haasiye mukurumbira waave nawo uchimupinda mumusoro asi anongoita zvefundo yake. “Fundo yakakosha uye ndiwo musimboti wezvese muhupenyu saka ndinotanga ndaita zvechikoro changu, ndapedza ndochienda kumotor-cross kunoita gadziriro dzangu kana ndakatarisana nemujaho.   “Mazuva ano fundo inodiwa pazvose nekuti mune ramangwana kana ndave kuzoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika handizive kuti zvinofamba sei saka zvakakosha kushanda nesimba kune zvose,” anodaro Mufaro.   Baba vake, Kudakwashe Kabasa uyo anove zvakare maneja wake, anoti chipo chiri pamwana wake chakakosha zvikuru. “Tinokoshesa fundo yaMufaro nemutambo uyu saka ini ndinenge ndiripo nguva dzese ndichimuendesa kuchikoro kana apedza toenda naye kunoita gadziriro dzake. Chishuwo chedu kuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu uye fundo yake achipasa zvakare,” anodaro Kabasa.

column2: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kuti VaMnangagwa Vabvume Kuti Hurumende Yavo Yakundikana
column3: Mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezveupfumi haachina kugadzikana izvo zvave kupa kuti vamwe vakurudzire kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF vabvume kuti vakundikana kufambisa nyika. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru zuva nezuva, mari hadzisi kuwanikwa nyore, zvitoro nemakambani zviri kuvhara zuva nezuva, nyika haina mafuta ekufambisa nezvimwe zvinodiwa pazuva nevanhu. Ukuwo, hurumende inonzi iri kuramba ichikwereta mari kunze senzira yekuedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. VeZanu PF vari kuramba kutambira kuti ndivo vari kukonzera matambudziko ari munyika aya, vachinongedza minwe kune vanopikisa, avo vavari kuti ndivo vari kuomesa zvinhu vachida kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika kushaikwa kwehunyanzvi kune vanotungamira makambani ari munyika, izvo zviri kuzokonzera kuti zvinhu zviparare munyaya dzezveupfumi. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi rePTUZ uye vari nhengo yeMDC, Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kurova imbwa vakaviga mupinyi vachiti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo ndivo vakundikana kufambisa basa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo chikuru chinofanirwa kuitwa ndechekuti muhurumende muve nekudhonza pamwechete, kwete zvakaratidzwa neveZanu PF avo vakabuda vachiti vakanga vasina kunzwikwa pfungwa dzavo negurukota rezveupfumi, VaMthuli Ncube pavakaburitsa hurongwa hwavo hwemari. No media source currently available

column2: Chabvondoka kuNash Stella Netball
column3: zvenetball zvemuzvikoro svondo rinotevera zvichatatsurana mumakwishu eNash Stella Netball 17 and Under Tournament ayo achaitirwa pachikoro chePamushana High School, kuMasvingo.Mutambo uyu uchatanga svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uchizotarisirwa kuzopera neChishanu.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reNational Association of School Heads (NASH), Johnson Madhuku uyo anove zvakare mukuru wechikoro chePamushana anoti mutambo wegore rino uchanakidza kukunda ngoma kurira sezvo chikwata chavo chine huturu hwekukundwa kwachakaitwa gore radarika apo chakatorerwa mukombe uyo wachainge chine makore akawanda chichirambira nawo. “Gore rino Pamushana tine huturu hukuru nekutorerwa kwatakaitwa mukombe wedu gore radarika. Saka tiri kuvimbisa hondo yega-yega kune zvimwe zvikwata, zvichaonerera gore rino mirai muone.   “Tiri pamusha saka ticharwa semvumba kuti mukombe urambe unesu, usare mupurovhinzi yedu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Zvakadaro, NASH ichashandisa mutambo uyu kusarudza vatambi vachazonomirira nyika kumitambo yeConfederation of School Sports Association of Southern Africa (COSSASA).  “Semakore ese, mutambo uyu ndiwo watinoshandisa kusarudza chikwata chedu chatichazotumira kunokwikwidza kuCOSSASA.   |Saka zvikwata zvese ngazviuye zvitambe netball “Kana uchida kuzotambira nyika mumutambo wenetball unototangira mumitambo iyi ndiko kwatinosarudza vatambi votanga kubikwa kusvika vapinda muchikwata chevakuru. Vamwe vacho vakatotanga kutambira zvikwata zvevakuru vachiri vadiki saka ngavashandise mukana uyu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Farayi Garayi wekambani yeTanganda Tea — iyo iri kukotsvera makwikwi aya — anoti vakazvipira kusimudzira vanasikana vane zvipo mumutambo wenetball.   “Isu neNASH tiri bhande nebhurugwa uye ticharamba tichishanda nesimba tichisimudzira mutambo uyu,” anodaro Garayi.

column2: Covid-19 yanyuka muzvikwata zvePSL
column3: PREMIER Soccer League yazivisa kuti Covid-19 yanyuka muzvimwe zvikwata zvayo.   Muchinyorwa chabva kumutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare, anoti vagashira mashoko anoti chirwere ichi chanyuka muzvikwata zvakasiyana naizvozvo vari kushanda nemachiremba kuti vagodzivirira kupararira kwacho.   “Tagashira mashoko anoti denda reCovid-19 ranyuka muzvikwata zvedu.   “Kutaura kuno tiri kushanda nenyanzvi dzezveutano nekomiti PSL Sport Medicine nemamwe mapoka kuedza kuona kuti tadzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   “Tinokurudzira zvikwata zvose kuti zvitevedzere matanho ose ane chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakawanda zviri kutevera.

column2: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
column3: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

column2: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chopararira Zvikuru kuMaruwa
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vana vechikoro vari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuvharwa kwezvikoro ndivo vamwe vari kubatsira kuparardzira chirwere ichi kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kunetsa muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakaudza Studio 7 pakupera kwesvondo kuti bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vachiti vanhu kumaruwa vanofanirwa kupihwa ruzivo rwakawanda pamusoro pechirwere ichi sezvo vaimbofunga kuti ichi chirwere chevanhu vemumadhorobha chete. No media source currently available

column2: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
column3: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.
